contest-event.event-date:
May 15, 1948 D Tamworth Contest
Tamworth Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Tamworth Contest tamworth-contest
Cosi Fan Tutte [arr. Godfrey]
Castle Grounds, Tamworth, Staffordshire March contest - 1st Ormonde Colliery, 2nd Snibstone Colliery, 3rd Stanton Ironworks. Deportment - Stanton. Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £15 and cup, 3rd £10, 4th £5.
June 18, 2014, 11:46 a.m. Feb. 18, 2019, 2:17 p.m.
1 William Davis Construction Group Band Simeon Iliffe
2 Loscoe Miners J. C. Webster
3 Langley Band Roland Davis
4 Ilkeston Brass H. Ball
